column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I believe they started it all. It had to be Lou
column2: Gino's or Unos. Lou is my favorite of the bunch. Gino's East was amazing back in the day. Uno's was incredible. But Lou? Addictive. I would wake up in the middle of the night craving more of the butter crust. I've been told that I make a pretty mean pizza and I have to say I cribbed a few tips from Lou. I would eat there more often but I have to get some sleep at night
column3: I can't afford to wake up craving crust.
